text: Bethune-Cookman University is a private university in Daytona Beach, Florida. The university has about 4,000 students. It was founded in 1904. The current president of the university is Trudie Kibbe Reed. It is a historically black university, which means that it was founded to educate African American students. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Wildcats. They have 7 varsity teams and they compete in the Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference. ==Other websites== *Bethune-Cookman University's Official website *Bethune-Cookman Wildcats' Official athletics website Category:1904 establishments in the United States Category:1900s establishments in Florida Category:Colleges and universities in Florida Category:Daytona Beach, Florida Category:Historically black colleges and universities Category:Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference
title: Bethune-Cookman University
